column1: 6.5. Share of World Mineral Production 2019, by Countries; column A Rank in 2019, column B Rank in 2018, column C Country, column D physical unit, column E production in 2019, column F Share of Total in %, column G Cumulative Share in %, column H is HHI: Herfindahl-Hirschman Index as a measure of market concentrations (details see Chapter 4.6)
